title: How Jonas Vingegaard trained to crush Tadej Pogačar at the Tour de France
content:
Team trainer lifts lid on framework that forged Vingegaard's yellow jersey dominance – how will it carry the Dane into Vuelta a España?

Read the full article at How Jonas Vingegaard trained to crush Tadej Pogačar at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
